Hi People!

Is it possible to see if he/she got a critical hit?
Maybe a texture pack?
Or a modification?

title: Texture pack - Critical hits

replies.body:
Yes, yes it is! You can see those particles without mods or texture packs.
You can see it in default.
You can also see sharpness particles, and you can make them more visible with texture packs ;)

replies.body: Yes, they do. You can only get critical hits while your jumping, but, you must be falling down whilst hitting the player, remember that, you can't get Criticals when your hitting them while jumping and going up, the Criticals come when your going in the downward motion, this tactic is very well used and is efficient

replies.body:
That is correct.

But having a texture pack that makes the particles, of whatever you're altering, bigger isn't considered an advantage. It's makes much less of an impact as something like 'low fire' which is completely legal.

replies.body:
Almost all PvP oriented packs make critical hit particles and sharpness particles more visible. They also introduce things like a bow meter, custom GUI, clear underwater, and low fire.

Check here for some cool packs: http://avicus.net/forums/12c295abc
